resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Load data to Azure SQL database incrementally')]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT max(TransactionDt) AS NewWatermarkValue
FROM dbo.Tickets

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from dbo.Tickets 
    where TransactionDt > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}'
    and TransactionDt <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

modifiedDatetimeStart.value: @if(contains(activity('Find Latest date').output, 'firstRow'), activity('Find Latest date').output.firstRow.LastModifiedDate, null)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT Container-Name as ContainerName,
	FolderName as foldername,
	FileName as filename,
	ColumnDelimiter as columndelimiter,
	Encoding as encoding,
	EscapeCharacter as escapecharacter,
	QuoteCharacter as quotecharacter,
	SchemaName as schemaname,
	TableName as tablename,
	Mapping as mapping
 FROM [etl].[tControlMetadata]

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Daily_trigger')]

pipelineReference.referenceName: Load data to Azure SQL database incrementally

dependsOn: [concat(variables('factoryId'), '/pipelines/Load data to Azure SQL database incrementally')]
